name: Ippy's World 2
description: Ippy's World 2! The sequel of Ippy's World. Ippy finds out when exploring he discovered a new friend! Ippy does not know why, but Kant keeps following Ippy, and Ippy accepts it. As they continue unfolding Earth, they find that there's a creaturet  that looks similar to Kant, who is planning on destroying life. Will they be able to do anything about it?  Find out by playing this game.
